banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Making a difference in the world
videoData.socialTitle: Making a difference in the world

nodes.whoTheyAre: Alison Quirk is State Street’s chief human resources and citizenship officer. She is the driving force in the development of State Street’s culture -- ensuring that employees globally feel engaged, valued and committed to its markets and clients. Quirk presents on topics related to career management, inclusion and diversity, and talent management, and she is a frequent contributor to The Huffington Post.

videoData.description: Alison Quirk tells the personal story of taking in a teenager from Nigeria who was recruited to play basketball at her daughter's high school. Through midnight phone calls, hospital visits, and important milestones, Alison explores the wonderful messiness of families – and how to leave a mark on the world.
videoData.socialDescription: Alison Quirk tells the personal story of taking in a teenager from Nigeria who was recruited to play basketball at her daughter's high school. Through midnight phone calls, hospital visits, and important milestones, Alison explores the wonderful messiness of families – and how to leave a mark on the world.
